attributes.description:
This is a 2010 Volvo S40 2.0, it’s much lighter on fuel consumption with performance as good as gold. This sedan has a delightful nature about it with greater balance too, it your best choice for a vehicle on the go loaded with features such as power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, black leather seats, central locking remote, air conditioning, radio/CD player and electric mirrors. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
This vehicle is now reduced to below cost no further discount can be expected!!!
This vehicle was reduced from R99 995 to R89 995.
#10097

Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
